General.Name: The BC Bud Corporation
General.Description: The BC Bud Corporation develops, manufactures, licenses, and sells recreational cannabis products in Canada. It offers cannabis based flower products; edibles, including chocolate-covered coffee beans under the Canna Beans and Canna Almonds brand names; concentrates under the Solventless Solutions brand; beer-like cannabis infused beverages under the Buds brand name; and lifestyle apparel. The BC Bud Corporation is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1500-409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2

3.Name: Mr. Daniel  Southan-Dwyer
